ComicInfo.Title: Almost Human, Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary: The android assassin Aphrodite IV is back in town and Sara's confrontation with the cold-blooded killer will force her to face her own actions during "War of the Witchblades."
ComicInfo.Characters: Hope Pezzini,Julie Pezzini,Aphrodite IV,Sara Pezzini,Detective Gleason,Witchblade
ComicInfo.Locations: New York City,New York State,Long Island
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Darick Robertson,J. Scott Campbell,Jonathan D. Smith,Nei Ruffino,Stjepan Šejić
